description: This file contains CSS styles and variable definitions for managing themes in the application, including light and dark themes. It defines styles for the main application components and provides responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application component with styles for layout and theming.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo including animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header with flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button with hover and active effects.
